Title: Relates to preventing discrimination and increasing awareness about menopause and perimenopause
Summary: Relates to preventing discrimination and increasing awareness about menopause and perimenopause; requires employers to provide employees with an informational pamphlet on any regulations relating to the rights of employees for menstrual-related and menopausal-related conditions.
LawCode: Amd ยง296, Exec L; add ยง201-j, Lab L; add ยง267-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the labor law and the public health law, in relation to preventing discrimination and increasing awareness of menopause and perimenopause
